entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
